title: Tome of Infinite Wisdom
summaries: The Tome of Infinite Wisdom is a Hardmode magic weapon that possesses two different modes of attack. When pressing the ⚒ Use / Attack button, the Tome of Infinite Wisdom fires bursts of four high-velocity pages that dissipate upon contact with enemies or solid tiles. When pressing the ⚷ Open / Activate button, it summons a large, high-velocity tornado that deals 175% of the weapon's base damage (63 damage), pierces an unlimited number of enemies, travels along blocks and through one-block low roofs, and dissipates after a duration of four seconds or upon being stopped by a wall of solid tiles. The Tome of Infinite Wisdom is dropped by Ogres during the Old One's Army event, with a 1/10 (10%) / 1/5 (20%) chance during Tier 2, and a 1/20 (5%) chance during Tier 3.
